scan.name: Baseline evaluation of 4 models
scan.description: This evaluation compares the robustness, accuracy, fairness and explanations for 4 candidate models.

model_use_case.name: Banking: Propensity to Buy
model_use_case.description:
In this use case, each entry in the dataset represents a target of a previous marketing campaign. The learning task is to predict who will make a term deposit with the bank as a result of a similar campaign.

This dataset was sourced from Kaggle:  https://www.kaggle.com/janiobachmann/bank-marketing-dataset

It is originally from the UCI Machine Learning Repository.
model_use_case.author: info@cognitivescale.com

model.name: Logistic Regression
model.description: Scikit-learn LogisticRegression classifier using lbfgs solver
